channel.title: Tech Talks Daily Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Daily Technology News and Interviews
channel.itunes:author: Neil C. Hughes
channel.itunes:summary: Your daily dose of tech news, interviews, and insights. Join us as we explore the latest trends in technology, AI, and digital transformation.
channel.description: Your daily dose of tech news, interviews, and insights. Join us as we explore the latest trends in technology, AI, and digital transformation.

item.title: The Future of AI in 2024
item.description: In this episode, we explore the future of AI in 2024 with leading experts in the field. Topics include: - Latest developments in machine learning - Ethical considerations - Impact on various industries
item.content:encoded:
In this episode, we explore the future of AI in 2024 with leading experts in the field.

Topics covered:

  • Latest developments in machine learning
  • Ethical considerations
  • Impact on various industries

Guest: Dr. Sarah Johnson, AI Research Director at Tech Institute
item.itunes:subtitle: Exploring the future of AI with industry experts
item.itunes:summary: Join us for an in-depth discussion about the future of AI in 2024, featuring insights from leading experts in the field.
